official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to rehabilitate and preserve the Delaware Canal and the Lehigh Canal in the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania in accordance with the provisions of the Historic Sites Act.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to rehabilitate and preserve the Delaware and Lehigh Canal, Pennsylvania, in accordance with the Historic Sites Act. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to rehabilitate and preserve the Delaware Canal and the Lehigh Canal in the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania in accordance with the provisions of the Historic Sites Act.
